issue.title: the use of the package : PySR
issue.body: Hi, I just begin to use the package. I use the python. But , I don't know whether it just need python3 .Do I need to install julia in order to use it?

nodes.body: I think these are answered in the installation section: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/PySR#installation. Python3, yes; Julia, yes.
